mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `pay_order` ( id, order_amount,consignee_name,consignee_phone,consignee_email,consignee_address, reward_id, reward_count, order_status, create_time, update_time ) VALUES(#{id},#{orderAmount},#{rewardId},#{consigneeName},#{consigneePhone},#{consigneeEmail},#{consigneeAddress},#{rewardCount},#{orderStatus},#{createTime},#{updateTime})
